12-01675 | blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 1867110 | pop_est_as_of = | pop_est_footnotes = | population_est = }} Apollo Beach is an unincorporated census-designated place in Hillsborough County, Florida, United States. The population was 26,002 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Florida Category:Unincorporated communities in Florida
